elements.label: Command
elements.value: Captain Agemon (prospective), Librarian in Terminator armour; (Wishlist) Chaplain in Terminator armour; Terminator Ancient.

elements.label: Line Strength
elements.value: 3× five-man Terminator squads (owned) → target 3× ten-man squads (needs +15 Terminators).

elements.label: Veterans
elements.value: Bladeguard Veterans — expand to full contingent.

companies.name: 8th Company — Storm Company
companies.notes: Assault & jump infantry; “Storm’s Voice” aesthetic under Chaplain Shepard.

elements.label: Command
elements.value: Captain Quintus (jump), Chaplain Shepard (Tempest Mortalis; Pax Ferrata), Lieutenant (plasma pistol & power fist).

elements.label: Key Squads
elements.value: 2nd Assault Squad led by Sgt. Kael — includes hand flamer; 2× grenadiers noted.

companies.name: 10th Company — Scouts & Vanguard
companies.notes: Recon, infiltration, target marking, terror-scout elements.

elements.label: Command
elements.value: Captain (Phobos), Librarian (Phobos), Lieutenants: Reiver-armoured; Phobos; combi-weapon.

elements.label: Infantry
elements.value: Scouts 3×5; Reivers 2×5 & 1×10; Incursors 1×5; Infiltrators 3×5; Eliminators ×2 squads.

relics.name: Tempest Mortalis
relics.notes: Reforged crozius arcanum — lineage to Reclusiarch Erastes.

relics.name: Pax Ferrata
relics.notes: Chained bolt sidearm; each link a vow.

heroes.name: Chaplain Shepard
heroes.notes: “Storm’s Voice.” Bearer of Tempest Mortalis; Pax Ferrata (chained).

heroes.name: Captain Lucian Marria
heroes.notes: Newly promoted; field-grade command duties (XO flavor).

heroes.name: Captain Quintus
heroes.notes: Jump Pack captaincy; assault doctrine lead.

heroes.name: Captain Agemon
heroes.notes: Veterans’ command prospect for Terminator cadre.

heroes.name: Librarian (Terminator Armour)
heroes.notes: Sanctioned psykana; attached to 1st Company operations.

campaigns.name: Eidolica Theatre
campaigns.notes: Home-world spiritual anchor; staging ground for Reclusiam chronicles.

campaigns.name: After-Action Reports
campaigns.notes: Templates for engagements, citations, and honors.

enemies.name: World Eaters
